item.title: Saying ‘Thank You’ to Chat GPT Uses Energy. Should You Do It Anyway?
item.description: Adding words to our chatbot can apparently cost tens of millions of dollars. But some fear the cost of not saying please or thank you could be higher.

item.title: Trump Tells Putin to ‘STOP!’ After Deadly Russian Attack on Kyiv
item.description: The attack, which killed at least 12 people, was the deadliest on Ukraine’s capital in nearly a year. President Trump called on President Vladimir V. ...

item.title: Trump’s Approval Rating Has Been Falling Steadily, Polling Average Shows
item.description: President Trump’s approval rating has sunk to about 45 percent, down from 52 percent one week after he took office.

item.title: Should We Start Taking the Welfare of A.I. Seriously?
item.description: As artificial intelligence systems become smarter, one A.I. company is trying to figure out what to do if they become conscious.

item.title: If America Walks Away From Ukraine, What Will Europe Do?
item.description: Europeans see Ukraine’s security as vital to their own and want to defend the principle of no border changes by force, even if President Trump does no...
